Class Door

  • java.lang.Object
    • Door
  • public class Door
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is part of the "World of Zuul" application. "World of Zuul" is a very simple, text based adventure game. This class is used to trait doors.
    Version:
    30/04/2020
    Author:
    Firas miladi
